title: Not in Search of Love
description: Akansha Kapoor and Vivaan Malhotra are burned by the flames of love. They're the go-to person for everyone but they fight a battle inside their hearts every day. Akansha wants to find answers to her endless questions that are deeply rooted in her mind that stems a feeling of inferiority within her. While Vivaan has checked out love from his life after labelling 'forever' as a mirage.Theyâ€™re drained and exhausted. Their spirits are shattered. Their faith in love is lost and they're not in search of love.Will, they ever find a key to their broken hearts?Will they give a second chance to love?Or will they slump down on the pitch of life?To know, join Akansha and Vivaan in their journey as they heal, rediscover, and try to move on from the past. A story of them, beginning from the end and ending before a new start.
author: Kashish  Aggarwal
